thread.title: Sugar Low: Commodity Plummets on Surplus

author: David Hodari
title: Sugar Low: Commodity Plummets on Surplus

organizations.name: sucden volatile stock market rolls into

text: For sugar, there’s no sweet ending in sight after a long period of declining prices. And analysts forecast another surplus next season, which begins in October, suggesting a recovery in sugar prices is a long way off. “Pretty much every bit of news coming out right now is bearish,” said Nick Penney a senior trader at Sucden Volatile Stock Market Rolls Into the ‘Sell in May’ Stretch Next Stocks to Watch: Apple, Boeing, Pfizer, Hasbro, Tapestry
